Whether finished in white, gray or in pecan, the Toronto Bedroom collection is the perfect way to furnish a cozy, comfortable bedroom. The simplicity of the collection allows these pieces to be used to complement any décor. From the unique dovetail drawer construction to the curved paneled wood insets, this collection has all the things necessary to make a room both beautiful and useful.

Features 
  • Rubberwood solids
  • Okume veneers
  • Ball-bearing drawer glides
  • Curved panel drawer fronts
  • French & English dovetail drawer construction
  • Brushed nickel hardware
Finish
  • White
Dimensions
  • 44”W x 18.25”D x 37”H

It’s a six-foot table that can extend to seven and a half with a drop-in leaf.

Ebony Oak

all-dining-room.Body:

Reminiscent of a white picket fence, the pedestal is made from solid acacia and finished in an antique white. all-dining-room.Name: PARK AVENUE RECTANGLE TABLE
all-dining-room.Body:
From the pedestal that supports the surface to the intricately patterned tabletop, the Park Avenue Dining Table creates an inspired focal point for your dining décor. The rounded arch design of the antique bronze-finished pedestal supports is mimicked on the table’s surface. The oak veneers in a warm brown finish evokes a sense of cordial company and the leaf insert will allow you to invite everyone to admire your beautiful table.

  • Metal accents

  • Medium Brown
Dimensions

all-dining-room.Name: PARK AVENUE SERVER
all-dining-room.Body:
The Park Avenue Server is a striking piece to accent your dining room. Finished in a warm brown on oak veneers, this piece is made by its details. Corrugated carved wood inlay frames the cabinets and drawers, while antique bronze metal accents define the corners. The whimsically-shaped, hand carved legs, the clever close-up mirror, all with clover shaped accents, including the headboard and drawer pulls, come together to bring a bit of inspired delight. The creamy white finish and neutral brown panel accents make this bedroom set the perfect start to any type of décor. Add versatility by choosing the bed and pieces that best fit your space. Both beautiful and unique, this bed, dresser, nightstand, and mirror is perfect for your child to grow up in.

The whimsically-shaped, hand carved legs, the clever close-up mirror, all with clover shaped accents, including the headboard and drawer pulls, come together to bring a bit of inspired delight. The creamy white finish and neutral brown panel accents make this bedroom set the perfect start to any type of décor. Add versatility by choosing the bed and pieces that best fit your space. Both beautiful and unique, this bed, dresser, nightstand, and mirror is perfect for your child to grow up in.

With this charming bedroom set for children and teens, the attraction is all in the details. The whimsically-shaped, hand carved legs, the clever close-up mirror, all with clover shaped accents, including the headboard and drawer pulls, come together to bring a bit of inspired delight. The creamy white finish and neutral brown panel accents make this bedroom set the perfect start to any type of décor. Add versatility by choosing the bed and pieces that best fit your space. park-avenue.Name: PARK AVENUE SERVER
park-avenue.Body:
The Park Avenue Server is a striking piece to accent your dining room. Finished in a warm brown on oak veneers, this piece is made by its details. Corrugated carved wood inlay frames the cabinets and drawers, while antique bronze metal accents define the corners. The final touches are the lovely, understated cabinet hardware that match the metal accents.     

Features 
  • Pine solids & Oak veneers
  • Ball-bearing drawer glides
  • Metal accents
  • Antique bronze hardware
  • 2 adjustable shelves
Finish
  • Medium Brown
Dimensions

park-avenue.Name: PARK AVENUE RECTANGLE TABLE
park-avenue.Body:
From the pedestal that supports the surface to the intricately patterned tabletop, the Park Avenue Dining Table creates an inspired focal point for your dining décor. The rounded arch design of the antique bronze-finished pedestal supports is mimicked on the table’s surface. The oak veneers in a warm brown finish evokes a sense of cordial company and the leaf insert will allow you to invite everyone to admire your beautiful table.     

Features 
  • Pine solids & Oak veneers
  • Extends to 96" with 1 x 24" drop in leaf
  • Fully set-up base
  • Metal accents
Finish
  • Medium Brown
Dimensions
  • 72/96”W x 44”D x 30”H

park-avenue.Body:

toronto.Name: TORONTO BED - PECAN
toronto.Body:
Whether finished in white, gray or in pecan, the Toronto Bedroom collection is the perfect way to furnish a cozy, comfortable bedroom. The simplicity of the collection allows these pieces to be used to complement any décor. From the unique dovetail drawer construction to the curved paneled wood insets, this collection has all the things necessary to make a room both beautiful and useful.          

Features 
  • Rubberwood solids & Okume veneers
  • 2 drawer side rail storage on kenlin glides

vegas.Name: VEGAS CHAIR
vegas.Body:
For contemporary styling at its finest, the Vegas upholstery set by Najarian blends traditional and modern design and a bit of glam to create a wholly unique aesthetic. Featuring wood frame construction for durability with pocketed coil seating for superior comfort and covered in an easy-to-clean, on-trend indigo colored fabric, with plush tufted seat and back, and a striking chrome metal leg base, the Vegas is the perfect fit for any living room looking for a pop of style that also offers everyday comfort.       

Body Fabric
  • M9989 Indigo
  • Fabric Contents: 100% polyester
  • Cleaning Code: S/W 
Leg Material
  • Metal Legs with Polished Nickel Finish
Dimensions
  • 41”W x 35”D x 29”H

venice.Body:
Bring the look of a sumptuous Italian palace to your bedroom with the Venice bedroom. Every inch of this bedroom furniture is filled with warm color and intricate detail, from stylized carvings and raised scrollwork to burled veneers and marble veneer tops.

  • Ash burl & cherry veneers with gold tippng
  • Antique acrylic inset in headboard

vogue-3-pcs.Name: VOGUE 3PC CHAIRS & TABLE SET
vogue-3-pcs.Body:
The Vogue chair and table set blend practicality and lavishness. Using wood frames, finished in a luminous glazed pewter finish with ivory upholstery, the Vogue will add just the right amount of elegance without overwhelming a room. The charming side table helps to reflect the refinement with a mirrored top. Cozy, yet classy, the Vogue 3 pack is certain to enliven any space.

Exposed Wood Frame
  • Rubberwood Solids and Birch Veneers
  • Finish: Grey Oak
Fabric
  • Brilliance Ivory
  • Fabric Contents: 100% polyester
  • Cleaning Code: W 
Dimensions
  • Chair 25.5”W x 25.5”D x 30”H
  • Table 16”W x 16”D x 22”H

woodbridge.Name: WOODBRIDGE SERVER BASE
woodbridge.Body:
The Woodbridge dining was built not only with elegance and sophistication in mind, but also with quality craftsmanship to ensure it will remain the centerpiece of the home for years to come. The table, with its sturdy, elaborately shaped pedestal base lends it character and the smooth, beveled top with gold-accented inlay creates a unique dining experience. The side chairs feature curved backs to ensure comfort along with quilted easy-to-clean PU upholstery that’s smart while providing durability. Beveled fronts and reflective acrylic trims in the server allow it to stand alone or be paired with a hutch for additional display.

Features 
  • Rubberwood & Poplar solids
  • Cherry veneers
  • Ball-bearing drawer glides
  • Acrylic accents
  • Rose gold colored hardware
Finish
  • Chocolate
Dimensions
  • 60”W x 18.5”D x 40”H
